name: NOSLEEP
description:
May you find sleep.

<------------->

Nosleep is a presudualy generated world that you must defeat in order to sleep.   Fight badies and upgrade your sword to take more hits and deal faster attacks.  Your health and attacks are the come from the same sorce.

Z/C - Attck

X/V - Sleep

Arrow keys - Move

Also support for controller

<------------->

This game if free to play online. But for the Full Offline Gaming Experience©®™* I would appreciate a little mula.  The pico-8 source code is also available for fellow PICO-8 peeps.

<------------->

      

Enjoy!  :)
